title: MIKE Announces 2025 Tour, Shares New “Pieces of a Dream” Video: Watch
description: The New York rapper and producer’s massive #AOTC Tour runs from February through May
author: Matthew Strauss
excerpt: The New York rapper and producer’s massive #AOTC Tour runs from February through May
text: MIKE is back with a self-produced new song, “Pieces of a Dream.” Watch the track’s new music video, directed by Ryosuke Tanzawa, below.“Pieces of a Dream” arrives with the news that MIKE will embark on a very big 2025 tour. The #AOTC Tour begins, in Dublin, Ireland, in February. The rapper and producer will stay in Europe until the begin of April. He’ll then begin North American shows, in Philadelphia, on April 16. The tour is slated to finish on May 31 in the musician’s native New York. See all of MIKE’s tour dates below.Read the review of MIKE’s most recent release, the Tony Seltzer collaboration Pinball.All products featured on Pitchfork are independently selected by our editors. However, when you buy something through our retail links, we may earn an affiliate commission.MIKE:02-27 Dublin, Ireland - The Button Factory02-28 Glasgow, Scotland - Room 203-01 Leeds, England - Brudenell Social Club03-03 Manchester, England - html:
MIKE is back with a self-produced new song, “Pieces of a Dream.” Watch the track’s new music video, directed by Ryosuke Tanzawa, below.

“Pieces of a Dream” arrives with the news that MIKE will embark on a very big 2025 tour. The #AOTC Tour begins, in Dublin, Ireland, in February. The rapper and producer will stay in Europe until the begin of April. He’ll then begin North American shows, in Philadelphia, on April 16. The tour is slated to finish on May 31 in the musician’s native New York. See all of MIKE’s tour dates below.

Read the review of MIKE’s most recent release, the Tony Seltzer collaboration Pinball.

All products featured on Pitchfork are independently selected by our editors. However, when you buy something through our retail links, we may earn an affiliate commission.
